rootCause: Whitespace inside moustache expressions for the sugarkube_cli helper and START_HERE_ARGS was reintroduced, so the justfile no longer matched the exact strings asserted by the CLI alignment tests and the wrappers stopped routing through the unified CLI.
resolution: Removed the padding inside the moustache expressions so the docs, nvme-health, token-place, pi cluster, and start-here recipes once again shell through "{{sugarkube_cli}}" and forward {{start_here_args}} without extra spaces.
